parameters.name: CheckingConfig
parameters.description: The check settings for sample data.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the rule. The description can be up to 500 characters in length.

parameters.name: Enabled
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the rule.

parameters.name: ErrorHandlers
parameters.description: The operations that you can perform after the rule-based check fails.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the rule. The name can be up to 255 characters in length and can contain digits, letters, and punctuation marks.

parameters.name: Severity
parameters.description:
The strength of the rule. Valid values:

*   Normal
*   High

parameters.name: TemplateCode
parameters.description: The ID of the template used by the rule.
